00021 #include <cstring>
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <string>
00025 //
00026 
00027 extern void test_file_writers(std::string file, std::string cdf);
00028 extern void test_file_readers(std::string file);
00029 
00030 std::string get_file(int argc,const char *argv[], int &i)
00031 {
00032         std::string file = "";
00033 
00034         // Get the file name.
00035         int j=i+1;
00036         while (j<argc && argv[j][0] != '-')
00037         {
00038                 file += argv[j];
00039                 if (j<argc-1 && argv[j+1][0] != '-')
00040                         file += " ";
00041                 ++j;
00042         }
00043         i = j-1;
00044 
00045         return file;
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, const char* argv[])
00050 {
00051         if (argc == 1)
00052         {
00053                 std::cout << "Synopsis: file-sdk-example <-w> <-i input_file> <-cdf cdf_file_name>" << std::endl;
00054                 return 0 ;
00055         }
00056 
00057         int i=1;
00058         bool bRead = true;
00059         std::string file;
00060         std::string cdf = "C:\\Program Files\\Affymetrix\\GeneChip\\Affy_Data\\Library\\Test3.CDF";
00061         while(i<argc)
00062         {
00063                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-w") == 0)
00064                         bRead = false;
00065 
00066                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i") == 0)
00067                         file = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00068 
00069                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-cdf") == 0)
00070                         cdf = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00071 
00072                 ++i;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (file.empty() == true)
00076                 return 0;
00077 
00078         if (bRead)
00079                 test_file_readers(file);
00080         else
00081                 test_file_writers(file, cdf);
00082 
00083         return 0;
00084 }
